price: Kandi ibiri mu birere n’ibiri mu isi byose ni ibya Allah. Ndetse Allah arahagije kuba Umurinzi.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
